dcterms:creator: R. Li
S. Kahou
H. Schulz
V. Michalski
L. Charlin
C. Pal
dcterms:description: The ReDial (Recommendation Dialogues) dataset is an annotated set of 11248 dialogues collected through Amazon Mechanical Turk. Each dialogue contains the movies and messages sent between two parties acting as either a 'recommender' or a 'recommendation seeker'.
dcterms:title: ReDIAL Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Maxwell Harper
Joseph A. Konstan
dcterms:description: The MovieLens 25m dataset is a collection of 25 million ratings and one million tag associations often used to quantify movie relationships and attributes.
dcterms:title: MovieLens 25m Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Vig
S. Sen
J. Riedl
dcterms:description: The MovieLens Tags dataset contains a tag genome which scores each movie’s relevance across a set of 1,129 tags, allowing for the association of movie attributes and better recommendations based on descriptive details in dialogue.
dcterms:title: MovieLens Tags Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Li
S. Kahou
H. Schulz
V. Michalski
L. Charlin
C. Pal
dcterms:description: The MovieLens Reviews dataset uses a joint dataset created to incorporate additional movie description and opinion data, aiding the model’s natural text generation and descriptive capabilities.
dcterms:title: MovieLens Reviews Dataset
